docs.title: Welcome to My blog
docs.text: I created this blog to share my thoughts, learnings, and experiences with you.

docs.title: What do you want to explore today?
docs.text:
Here are the topics I'd be broadly writing about: * Chess - I like chess. So I play it often (sometimes even mindlessly). You can find my chess.com page here - Before starting this blog, I never got to study chess formally. Now I plan to spend some time studying chess and documenting my learnings. - I felt it'd be great if I could document my learnings in a blog, and that's why this vertical. * Verification - I am a front end Design Verification engineer and Verification is my bread and butter. - The domain is ever expanding (so many protocols, so many methodologies, so many perspectives {VIP, SoC, IP etc.,}) and there's humungous scope for improvement. - I remember learning about corner cases in FIFO a couple of years back which I don't remember now. If only I had my short notes available, I'd have quickly gave it a glance. Why don't I digitalize my short notes? In fact, why don't I blog my notes? * Philosophy - I keep exploring the three major schools of thought that our ancients passed on to us: - Dvaita - Advaita (I find major connection to this wisdom) - Visistadvaita - I also sometimes read articles or books on life in general. - I plan to document those learnings under the heading 'Vichaara Saagaram'. - A bit about the title: - Vichaaram means contemplation or Inquiry. - Saagaram means Ocean. - Vichaara Saagaram means an Ocean of Contemplation.

I hope you find this blog interesting and informative.

Side Note: In case you are curious about the picture I used on this page, it's a caveman sharing his learnings with all of us with the stone being his blog.
